definition: to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
to drive in reverse/fig. to take a backward step/retrogressive/trying to turn the clock back

sentences.english: Look, the moving van is backing into their driveway.
sentences.chinese: 你看，運傢俱的大卡車正在往他們家的車道上倒車呢。

sentences.english: Ultrasonic back-up radar is a set of safety assistant installation applied on auto back-up.
sentences.chinese: 智能倒車雷達是一套汽車倒車時的安全輔助裝置。

sentences.english: Ultrasonic back-up radar is a set of safety assistant installation applied on auto back-up.
sentences.chinese: 智能倒車雷達是一套汽車倒車時的安全輔助裝置。

sentences.english: Break a mirror who works as a knife.
sentences.chinese: 打破倒車鏡，把碎玻璃當刀用。

sentences.english: Lamp, Bumper, Mirror, Hood, Fender, Frame of water tank.
sentences.chinese: 大燈，保險槓，倒車鏡，機蓋，葉子板，水箱框架。

sentences.english: The administration has turned the clock back with its new plans for education.
sentences.chinese: 政府實施新的教育計劃，其實是開倒車。

sentences.english: Back up in that space next to the blue Honda.
sentences.chinese: 請倒車停在那輛蘭色本田車旁邊的位置。

sentences.english: This is why very feminine women are not great reverse parkers  or  map  readers.
sentences.chinese: 因此，極具女性氣質的女人往往不擅長倒車或看地圖。

sentences.english: Remove switch for reversing light from the transmission.
sentences.chinese: 從變速器上拆下倒車燈開關。

sentences.english: I hit the  truck when I backed out into the street.
sentences.chinese: 當我倒車入街時撞了那輛卡車。
最大向後倒車轉速是多少？

sentences.english: She backed the car through the gate.
The driver bumped the kerb while reversing.
sentences.chinese: 司機倒車時撞着了路邊石。

sentences.english: SECURITY. Reverse alarm neutral start switch handlever parking brake.
sentences.chinese: 倒車報警器，空擋啓動開關，手動駐車制動。
